content.rendered:
Our Engineering team has extensive experience in installation of Mobile Offshore Unit (MOU) and Mobile Offshore Drilling Unit (MODU) ranging from site appraisal, transportation (location move), foundation assessment for jack-ups, mooring analysis for floaters to structural assessment of MOU/MODU.

  • Towage study/ Dry Transportation Analysis
  • Float-On and Float-Off Analysis
  • Desktop Review of Geotechnical and Geophysical Data
  • Planning and QA/QC of Geotechnical and Geophysical Site Investigation and Laboratory Testing
  • Foundation Assessment for Installation and Removal of Jack-Up including Geohazard Assessment and Mitigations
    • Punch-through potential
    • Sliding potential/Interaction with old footprints
    • Perforation drilling operation
  • Site Specific Assessment / Structural Integrity Assessment of Jack-Up
  • Mooring Analysis

jetpack-related-posts.title: Rig Moves
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar has a team of master mariners, rig movers, naval architects, structural engineers and geotechnical engineers specialised in rig move business covering independent technical assessment and verification, MWS engineering review, survey attendance and approval for ocean move, in-field move and installation, lay-up and reactivation of rigs. Suitability and Operational Condition…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Offshore Renewable Energy
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar is involved in supporting the development of offshore renewable energy by providing engineering consultancy for the following areas: Planning and QA/QC of Geotechnical and Geophysical Site Investigation and Laboratory Testing Site Assessment including Cable Route Foundation System Assessment (Gravity Based, Monopile, Tripod, Jacket)Mooring System Design and Analysis for Floating…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Geotechnical Engineering
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our geotechnical staff are specialists in jack up leg penetration analyses, offshore site investigations, and geotechnical design and installation analysis for offshore oil & gas and wind turbine foundations.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Jack-up Engineering
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Based primarily in the UK with representatives worldwide, the jack-up team consists of naval architects and structural and geotechnical engineers, who and are jack-up specialists.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Marine & Offshore Engineering Services
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We provide marine & offshore engineering services in the major marine energy centers around the world. Our engineers have a good understanding of the local regulatory requirements, the available industry infrastructure and the culture they operate in.
